channel.title: Ne Plus Inutile
channel.description: The World's Worst Podcast. The title is very bad Latin for "nothing more useless", which is a pretty good description of this podcast with no discernable focus and only occasional updates. 1 star.
channel.itunes:author: James P. Goltz
channel.itunes:subtitle: Ne Plus Inutile is very bad Latin for "nothing more useless".
channel.itunes:summary: The World's Worst Podcast. "Ne Plus Inutile" is very bad Latin for "nothing more useless", which is a pretty good description of this podcast with no discernable focus and only occasional updates.

item.title: Episode 7: Shhh, I'm Busy
item.description: In which I watch TV and waste your time.
item.itunes:author: James P. Goltz
item.itunes:subtitle: In which I watch TV and waste your time.
item.itunes:summary: In which I watch TV and waste your time.

item.title: Episode 6: Major Capital Investment
item.description: I face a major decision on capital investment in the podcast.

item.itunes:summary: I face a major decision on capital investment in the podcast.

item.title: Episode 5: The Limits of Freedom
item.description: Having "fixed" the microphone problem, I now run into the limits of free software.
item.itunes:author: James P. Goltz
item.itunes:subtitle: Having "fixed" the microphone problem, I now run into the limits of free software.
item.itunes:summary: Having "fixed" the microphone problem, I now run into the limits of free software.

item.title: Episode 4: The Rustling 2: The Re-enrustlening
item.description: I try again, and have finally pinpointed the source of the rustling. Not that you can tell from this episode.
item.itunes:author: James P. Goltz
item.itunes:subtitle: I try again, and have finally pinpointed the source of the rustling. Not that you can tell from this episode.
item.itunes:summary: I try again, and have finally pinpointed the source of the rustling. Not that you can tell from this episode.

item.title: Episode 3: Mysterious Rustling
item.description: I may be taking this "world's worst podcast" thing a bit too far.
item.itunes:author: James P. Goltz
item.itunes:subtitle: I may be taking this "world's worst podcast" thing a bit too far.
item.itunes:summary: I may be taking this "world's worst podcast" thing a bit too far.

item.title: Episode 2: Muttering in the Morning
item.description: I had some time before leaving for work.
item.itunes:author: James P. Goltz
item.itunes:subtitle: I had some time before leaving for work.
item.itunes:summary: I had some time before leaving for work.

item.title: Episode 1: Just Taking Up Space
item.description: Think of this as the podcast equivalent of clearing one's throat.

item.title: Episode 0: What's In The Box, Frank?
item.description: The superhero origin story of Ne Plus Inutile, at least until "Crisis on Infinite Storage".
